item.title: Hope is Not a Strategy
item.description:
Hope is Not a Strategy

I keep hearing a common scenario come up with some of my clients and their sales people, and I am going to go out on a limb here and take a bet that you've heard it from your sales people too. Let me paint the picture for you.

item.title: Seth's Blog
item.description:
Seth's Blog

"That's good enough, let's move on" Lots of things could be better (cars, buildings, candy, etc.) but we understand that the cost of pushing through to the next level is prohibitive.

item.title: Explaining the Rise of Donald Trump
item.description:
Explaining the Rise of Donald Trump

Whenever I read or hear a news story about the perplexing rise of Donald Trump, I myself am confused. Confused, not by Trump's rise, but how predictable his rise was given the politics of the past decade. The Republican Party did such an expert marketing job for the past 8 years that it actually worked.
